intro: Life Insurance ensures that your family is financially taken care of if you die early. Buy life insurance directly (not through your employer) once you have kids.

list: Term Life - pay a low premium and hoping that you don’t have to use it
But if you die, you family is taken care of
Typically buy the longest term possible (30yr insurance) right before the age of 50
Permanent Life - pay a high premium and it lasts forever
You might consider this if you earn a lot when you’re young
